messages.startupErr: An error appeared at startup. Please contact us at support@mybudgetview.com.
messages.bundledJreErr: This application was configured to use a bundled Java Runtime Environment but the runtime is missing or corrupted.
messages.jreVersionErr: Java not found. Please install it from http://java.com/download and restart BudgetView.
messages.launcherErr: The registry refers to a nonexistent Java Runtime Environment installation or the runtime is corrupted.
messages.instanceAlreadyExistsMsg: BudgetView was not properly installed. Please uninstall and reinstall again BudgetView (Your data won't be removed).
